rows.label: bf02030150_0010
rows.name:
So you see, by maximizing cellular regeneration
to retain all vital bodily functions...

rows.label: bf02030150_0020
rows.name: I seem to have reverted to a larval stage.

rows.label: bf02030150_0030
rows.name:
Well that's quite handy.
Must be nice to be a Divine Beast!

rows.label: bf02030150_0040
rows.name:
This isn't something just any old Divine Beast can do!
Only one so advanced as myself-

rows.label: bf02030150_0050
rows.name: Erm, Rex, are you angry?

rows.label: bf02030150_0060
rows.name: Hmf! I'm not.

rows.label: bf02030150_0070
rows.name: I just look like an idiot crying over nothing.

rows.label: bf02030150_0080
rows.name: Sure does look like you're angry to me.

rows.label: bf02030150_0090
rows.name: So when will you be back to your old self?

rows.label: bf02030150_0100
rows.name:
Good question.
No more than 300 years.

rows.label: bf02030150_0110
rows.name:
Th-three hundred years?
But I'll be long dead by then!

rows.label: bf02030150_0120
rows.name: Hmm. I suppose that's true.

rows.label: bf02030150_0130
rows.name:
But...what about my house?!
Do I have to live on the streets?!

rows.label: bf02030150_0140
rows.name: Perhaps this is an opportunity to fly the nest.

rows.label: bf02030150_0150
rows.name: You mean...pay rent?

rows.label: bf02030150_0160
rows.name: You're so mean.

rows.label: bf02030150_0170
rows.name: It's a massive extra expense!

rows.label: bf02030150_0180
rows.name: Still... Glad you're OK, Gramps.

rows.label: bf02030150_0190
rows.name:
Oh, shoot! We can't stand around all day!
We have to find Nia!

rows.label: bf02030150_0200
rows.name:
Nia? You mean that Driver
and her Blade from before?

rows.label: bf02030150_0210
rows.name: Yeah. They saved our lives.

rows.label: bf02030150_0220
rows.name: I do hope they are all right.

rows.label: bf02030150_0230
rows.name: Gramps, do you remember anything?

rows.label: bf02030150_0240
rows.name:
I remember crashing through many
trees before landing here...

rows.label: bf02030150_0250
rows.name: They probably fell off then.

rows.label: bf02030150_0260
rows.name:
Hmm, that's not a whole
lot to go on...

rows.label: bf02030150_0270
rows.name:
Perhaps we would have some luck
following the trail of broken trees?

rows.label: bf02030150_0280
rows.name:
Good thinking, Homura!
Let's go!

rows.label: bf02030150_0290
rows.name:
By the way, Rex, is that a Core
Crystal I see shining on your chest?

rows.label: bf02030150_0300
rows.name: Just what happened to you?

rows.label: bf02030150_0310
rows.name:
I'll tell you later. Right now
we need to find Nia!

rows.label: bf02030150_0320
rows.name: Ohoh! Now this makes a nice change!
